solution_line_template: First subtract the coupon amount from the price of the food: ${initial_cost} - ${coupon_amount} = $<<{initial_cost}-{coupon_amount}={cost_after_coupon}>>{cost_after_coupon}
Then subtract {senior_discount_percent}% from {total_percent}% to find out what percentage of the reduced price Carla pays: {total_percent}% - {senior_discount_percent}% = {percentage_paid_value}%

Now multiply the price after the coupon by the percentage Carla pays to find the final price: ${cost_after_coupon} * {percentage_paid_decimal} = $<<{cost_after_coupon}*{percentage_paid_decimal}={final_price}>>{final_price}
